name: Scuffed Flappy bird clone
description: I coded this from scratch in the span of an hour or so. No purposes other than to show a friend which wanted to learn how to code my usual coding pipeline.
instructions: Select <kbd>New game</kbd> in the main menu, move with <kbd>W</kbd>,<kbd>A</kbd>,<kbd>S</kbd>,<kbd>D</kbd>, talk with npc with <kbd>SPACEBAR</kbd>. There should be a lot of easter eggs key, you could find some by pressing random keys.
